0: RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING ROGER CASUGAY FOR WINNING THE PHILIPPINES’ FIRST-EVER GOLD MEDAL IN SURFING AT THE 30TH SOUTHEAST ASIAN GAMES AND COMMENDING HIS HEROIC ACT IN RESCUING INDONESIAN SURFER ARIP NURHIDAYAT IN THE MIDDLE OF THEIR ONE-ON-ONE RACE DURING THE SEMI FINALS

history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HR00596
FULL TITLE : RESOLUTION CONGRATULATING ROGER CASUGAY FOR WINNING THE PHILIPPINES’ FIRST-EVER GOLD MEDAL IN SURFING AT THE 30TH SOUTHEAST ASIAN GAMES AND COMMENDING HIS HEROIC ACT IN RESCUING INDONESIAN SURFER ARIP NURHIDAYAT IN THE MIDDLE OF THEIR ONE-ON-ONE RACE DURING THE SEMI FINALS
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : SY-ALVARADO, "KUYA" JOSE ANTONIO R.
DATE FILED : 2019-12-11
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE
COMMITEE HEARINGS/ACTIONS:
      1. Deliberated upon by the Mother Committee on 2020-02-04
          -The body directed the Secretariat to prepare the substitute resolution to these measures and their corresponding committee reports.
      2. Measure approved by the Committee on 2020-02-04
      3. Draft of Substitute/Amended/Consolidated Measure prepared on 2020-02-18
      4. Committee Report approved on 2020-03-10
          -Adopted as Resolution No. HR00050
      5. Prepared and Transmitted the required copies of Committee Report on 2020-03-10
      6. Committee Report filed on 2020-03-10
          -House Committee Report No. 00278, Substituted by HR00776
      7. Referred the Committee Report to the Committee on Rules (OB) on 2020-03-10
      8. Approved for Inclusion in the Calendar of Business on 2020-03-10
MOTHER BILL: HR00776
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
